hooks.command: for f in $CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS; do [[ "$f" == *.php ]] && rel="${f#$PWD/}" && [[ "$rel" == backend/* ]] && ddev exec bash -c "cd /var/www/html/backend && vendor/bin/php-cs-fixer fix --quiet '${rel#backend/}'" 2>/dev/null; done; exit 0

for f in $CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS; do [[ "$f" == *.php ]] && rel="${f#$PWD/}" && [[ "$rel" == backend/* ]] && ddev exec bash -c "cd /var/www/html/backend && vendor/bin/phpstan analyse --no-progress '${rel#backend/}'"; done; exit 0
